full_title: U My Everything by Sexyy Red & Drake
title: U My Everything

description.plain:
Sexyy Red recruits Canadian rapper Drake for Track 4, “U My Everything,” off of Sexyy Red’s third studio album In Sexyy We Trust. The pair have collaborated a few times and regularly show appreciation for each other on social media.

The song starts off with Sexyy Red rapping over a Tay Keith production before the beat switches, leaving Drake to rap over Metro Boomin’s beat titled, “BBL DRIZZY BPM 150.mp3,” he produced and shared, encouraging fans to diss Drake—starting a viral internet challenge—further adding fuel to the beef between Drake and Metro Boomin.

embed_content: Read “U My Everything” by Sexyy Red & Drake on Genius

Sexyy Red recruits Canadian rapper Drake for Track 4, “U My Everything,” off of Sexyy Red’s third studio album In Sexyy We Trust. The pair have collaborated a few times and regularly show appreciation for each other on social media.

The song starts off with Sexyy Red rapping over a Tay Keith production before the beat switches, leaving Drake to rap over Metro Boomin’s beat titled, “BBL DRIZZY BPM 150.mp3,” he produced and shared, encouraging fans to diss Drake—starting a viral internet challenge—further adding fuel to the beef between Drake and Metro Boomin.
